entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:57 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 2:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 32 %
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
